message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $750,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value is $800,000 to you. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you!
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $750,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save a little more. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product. Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save a little more. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $725,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
